## Properties

| Property           | Attribute           | Description                                                                                                        | Type     | Default |
| ------------------ | ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ------- |
| `text`             | `text`              | (optional) text inside back to top button                                                                          | `string` | `'â¬†'`   |
| `visibilityHeight` | `visibility-height` | (optional) define the scroll height value, the back to top button will not show until the height reaches the value | `number` | `200`   |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                               | Description                                      |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `--back-to-top__container-background`              | Background of back to top container              |
| `--back-to-top__container-border-radius`           | Border radius of back to top container           |
| `--back-to-top__container-bottom`                  | Bottom of back to top container                  |
| `--back-to-top__container-cursor`                  | Cursor of back to top container                  |
| `--back-to-top__container-display`                 | Display of back to top container                 |
| `--back-to-top__container-height`                  | Height of back to top container                  |
| `--back-to-top__container-position`                | Position of back to top container                |
| `--back-to-top__container-right`                   | Right of back to top container                   |
| `--back-to-top__container-visible-align-items`     | Align items of back to top container visible     |
| `--back-to-top__container-visible-color`           | Color of back to top container visible           |
| `--back-to-top__container-visible-display`         | Display of back to top container visible         |
| `--back-to-top__container-visible-font-size`       | Font size of back to top container visible       |
| `--back-to-top__container-visible-justify-content` | Justify content of back to top container visible |
| `--back-to-top__container-width`                   | Width of back to top container                   |
| `--back-to-top__container-z-index`                 | Z index of back to top container                 |
